articles.title: Video shows the moment shots fired during Highland Park parade - CNN Video
articles.description: A video shows the moment shots were fired into a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, which resulted in dozens injured and at least six dead.

articles.author: Rosa Flores, Jacqueline Rose and Alexa Miranda, CNN
articles.title: 'I'm terrified I might be here forever': Brittney Griner pens handwritten letter to Biden
articles.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner, in a handwritten letter to President Joe Biden, said she fears she will be detained in Russia indefinitely and pleaded with the President not to forget about her and other American detainees.
articles.content: (CNN)WNBA star Brittney Griner, in a handwritten letter to President Joe Biden, said she fears she will be detained in Russia indefinitely and pleaded with the President not to forget about her and o… [+5509 chars]

articles.author: Megan Thomas
articles.title: Rachel Brosnahan 'sick' over shooting in her hometown of Highland Park
articles.description: Actress Rachel Brosnahan is expressing her grief over the mass shooting in Highland Park, Illinois on Monday that has left at least six people dead and dozens more injured.

articles.author: Jason Hanna, Adrienne Broaddus and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: 'People just falling and falling': Witnesses describe terror at Illinois parade shooting
articles.description: Zoe Pawelczak's dad thought the repetitive pops ringing out at Highland Park's Fourth of July parade Monday morning were part of the show, she says. But she felt something was off.

articles.author: Betsy Klein and Donald Judd, CNN
articles.title: Bidens 'shocked' by Highland Park shooting as White House prepares to mark July Fourth
articles.description: President Joe Biden began Independence Day by sharing a message that looked to the country's future, but quickly had to respond to another mass shooting in the US.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Like a battle zone': Witness describes scary moment shots rang out at Highland Park parade - CNN Video
articles.description: A number of people were killed at a July 4th parade in Highland Park, Illinois, Highland Park police announced in a press conference. The suspect remains at large. CNN's Adrienne Broaddus talks to Zoe Pawelczak, a parade attendee who was present as the shooti…

articles.author: By Aditi Sangal, Elise Hammond, Maureen Chowdhury and Mike Hayes, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Police responding to shooting at July 4th parade in Illinois
articles.description: Police are responding to a shooting in downtown Highland Park, Illinois, in the area of a July 4th parade, authorities said. Follow here for the latest news updates.
articles.content:
Miles Zaremski, a Highland Park, Illinois, resident, told CNN he was walking to the Fourth of July parade when he heard a "pop" and thought that maybe a car backfired.

articles.title: Live updates: Suspect in custody after Highland Park, Illinois, July 4th parade shooting

articles.title: Live updates: Highland Park shooting at July 4 parade in Illinois
